page.title: 04The church at Twyford
page.content: The church in Twyford is made from stone,which is very old.I should say the person who built the church was very wise.Particularly since he built it in the right place considering Twyford usually gets flooded every winter.The church never has been flooded.The church is very old but is in good condition.Like every church it has its own graveyard. All the grave stones are facing the East since they belive god appears from the East.In the graveyard the grass was very springy because unlike some people,people cant afford grave stones,so they just buired them anywhere.The church is old but not as old as the arch in the church.Past the old arch it is especially decorated for marriges and other special things,with a blue matching velvet carpet lied out.
